For his time, he was a renowned Confucian scholar, yet failing the *million-word essay* examination, he turned to the Dao/Way, becoming a foremost disciple of **Yìng Shì** (Responding Master). He once remarked that the Daoist teachings and rituals, since compiled by **Hàn Tiānshī** (Han Heavenly Master) and **Lù Xiūjìng** (Lu Modesty of the Pure), had over time fallen into disuse and decay. Thus, he scrutinized their authenticity, systematically recording their origins, and so the Daoist clergy across the land followed his arrangements to this day.

Emperor **Lǐzōng** summoned him to serve as a literary draftsman in **Lín Dé Diàn** (Lynx Virtue Hall). At the time, he was praised as saying:
*"A forest of words, a sea of learning;
Upholding the lineage, establishing the teaching—
the foremost under heaven."*

During the **Zhōnglǐ** era, he accompanied the imperial procession to Shu, where he grew old in **Chéngdū**. When **Wáng Jiàn** ruled Shu, he summoned him as a teacher for the royal prince. He once told **Xú Guāngbù** (Xu Broad Virtue), *"In my youth, I studied at the imperial university, where all texts were available. Within a month, I divided each day’s study:
The first day, I recited the Classics;
The second, I read the histories and commentaries;
The third, I practiced composition;
The fourth, I recorded anecdotes;
The fifth, I rested leisurely to cultivate my will.
This cycle completed in five days, repeated monthly.
In less than five years, I mastered all the texts."*

**Guāngbù**, the Shù chancellor, had once been his disciple.

The Heavenly Master first encountered the **Chén Tǐ** (Body of Truth) scripture and later obtained divine elixirs. In **Chéngdū**, he resided at **Zhū Xiān Yīn** (Jade Immortal’s Retreat), where his teachings resonated widely. In autumn, he declined further invitations and never met again. One day, he suddenly told his disciples, *"Last night, I dreamed of presenting myself to the Celestial Sovereign as the overseer of Mín Yuè (the sacred peaks)."* At that time, the **True Palace** was being constructed on **Qīngchéng Shān** (Green City Mountain), and its completion was announced. He then donned his ritual robes, performed farewell rites, and ascended the hall, bidding his disciples farewell before attaining *spiritual dissolution* (*huà*). His remains were buried on **Qīngchéng**, but his coffin was found unusually light—upon opening it, only a single sandal remained.

He authored numerous works, including the *Hùnyuán Tú* (Mixed Primordial Diagram), *Yìjì Shèngfù* (Sacred Ode of the Epoch), *Guǎngshèng Yì* (Expanded Sacred Meaning), *Lìdì Jì* (Record of the Imperial Lineage), *Língyàn Jì* (Record of Miraculous Verifications), *Kējiào Yífàn* (Ritual Standards of Teachings), *Zhāngcí Biǎoshì* (Models of Chapters and Proclamations), and hundreds of songs and miscellaneous writings, collectively titled *Guǎngchéng Jí* (Collection of Broad Achievement). He was posthumously honored as **Guǎngchéng Xiānshēng** (Master of Broad Achievement).

**Sū Chéngyǐn** (Su Concealed Virtue)
The Daoist **Sū Chéngyǐn** resided at **Zhèn Yáng Lóngxīng Guàn** (Dragon’s Ascension Hall in Zhengyang), mastering the teachings of **Lǎozǐ** and **Zhuāngzǐ**, and excelling in *qi* cultivation and nourishment. In the **Kāibǎo** era (968 CE), Emperor **Tàizǔ** stationed in **Zhèn Yáng**, summoned him to the palace. The emperor said, *"Master, you are over eighty yet appear youthful—this is the art of nurturing life. Please instruct me."* **Chéngyǐn** replied, *"My method of nurturing life is no more than refining thought and cultivating the spirit. For rulers, the path differs."* He cited **Lǎozǐ**:
*"If I act without action, the people transform themselves;
If I desire nothing, the people return to simplicity.
Without action, without desire—
the spirit merges with the Great Harmony."*

The emperor praised his words and bestowed extraordinary honors.

**Zhāng Wúmèng** (Zhang Dreamless)
**Zhāng Wúmèng**, styled **Língyǐn** (Hidden Forest), was renowned for his filial piety. He favored solitude, studied the *Yìjīng* (Changes Classic), and at adulthood, entrusted his wealth to his younger brother before entering **Huà Shān** (Flowery Mountain), where he befriended **Zhǒng Fàng** (Seed Release) and **Liú Hǎitán** (Liu Sea Pot), serving **Xīyí Shì** (Harmonious Master). He gained profound insights. Afterward, he wandered to **Tiāntái Shān** (Heavenly Terrace Mountain) and **Chìchéng** (Scarlet City), dwelling there for over a decade. His cultivation was refined, and he expressed his inner truths in poetry, composing *Hái Yuán Piān* (Hundred Verses of Returning to the Primordial) with a hundred stanzas. **Xià Yīnggōng** (Summer Noble Lord) visited him in the mountains, obtaining the poems to present at court. **Wáng Jìgōng** (Wang of Ji), as chancellor, received the poems and later submitted them to the throne.

Emperor **Zhēnzōng** inquired about strategies for longevity. **Wúmèng** replied, *"I am a rustic—only reciting the *Lǎozǐ* and *Zhōuyì* in the mountains."* The emperor commanded him to lecture on the *Yìjīng*, and he expounded on the **Jiǎn** (Modesty) hexagram. The emperor asked, *"Why only the Modesty hexagram?"* **Wúmèng** answered, *"In times of great abundance, one must govern with modesty."* The emperor delighted in his words and offered him the post of **Zhuózhuò Zuǒláng** (Literary Draftsman), which he declined. Later, the emperor summoned him again to lecture on *Hái Yuán Piān*, offering wine and gifts, which he also refused. The emperor then bestowed the title **Chùshì Xiānshēng** (Recluse Master), which he declined as well. The emperor composed a poem in reply:

*"The Dao of Mixed Primordial contains pure essence,
Observe it—no trace, listen—no sound.
Only the enlightened attain this truth,
Adrift beyond the world, immersed in stillness.

Floating clouds unfold beyond ordinary form,
Flowing water circles without fixed shape.
On impulse, I left the mountain’s gate,
To discuss the Dao, I briefly visited the royal court.
With the wind, I heard the essence of the lineage,
Returning to the stone, I sought my natural ease.

Jade and silk, cap and sash—unworthy of my regard,
I sang long and now return with imperial favor.
The next day, I departed by decree,
The court ordered my stipend from Tàizhōu—
I did not request it.
Thus, my life’s end was pure and untainted."*

He died at ninety-nine in **Jīnlíng**. Three days later, white *qi* emerged from his crown, rising three feet high. His *Jūn Tái Shī* (Jade Terrace Poems) circulated in the world. His disciple, **Bìxū Zǐ** (Azure Void Child) **Chén Jǐngyuán** (Chen Scenic Element), inherited the essence of **Lǎozǐ** and **Zhuāngzǐ**.

**Liú Shì** (Master Liu)
**Liú Cóngshàn**, styled **Shùnfū** (Obedient Husband), from a young age, favored Daoist learning. He took ordination at **Jiànlóng Guàn** (Observing Dragon Hall). In the early **Tiānshèng** era, he resided at **Jǐnglíng Gōng** (Scenic Spirit Palace) by imperial decree. The emperor and empress desired to receive Daoist initiation. **Shàoguān Miào Shì** (Mysterious Observation Master) **Zhū Zìyīng** (Zhu Self-Cultivation) established an altar at **Yùqīng Zhāoyìng Gōng** (Jade Purity Responsive Palace), commanding **Cóngshàn** to participate in the ritual. The emperor was strict in filial offerings, sending envoys to instruct him on the taboo dates of the late emperor, ordering him to recite incantations before the deities during the ritual meal.

Thus, **Cóngshàn** compiled the incantation formulas from the **Sāndòng Jīng** (Three Caverns Scriptures) and later submitted the ritual texts. The emperor praised him, bestowing the title **Quánsù** (Complete Purity), and ordered his compositions to be inscribed in all Daoist halls. The ritual of *zòushí* (ritual meal offerings) originated with him. When the **Yánníng Gōng** (Serene Peace Palace) was completed, many submitted poems for the imperial portrait’s five-viscera inscriptions, but only **Cóngshàn’s** met with approval. His text was engraved on gold and jade plaques.

When Emperor **Rénzōng** fell ill, he summoned **Cóngshàn** to present petitions inside the palace, commanding officials to relay his words. After kneeling and presenting his memorial, the emperor asked, *"Did your words reach me?"* He replied, *"They have reached you."*

chunks.original_text: 时晏驾已数刻，忽复精神明爽，传宣曰：问葛将军何神？ 从善曰：三天门下有神，曰中元葛将军，主通章之神也。 复传宣，令设位。 翌日，圣体遂康，谕左右曰：朕昨夜至天门，有葛将军云，皇帝未合来，急借马遣回，遂寤。 上解御服，衽席金帛赐之，欲以先生号加锡，固辞。 英宗朝丞相韩魏公，复请先生号赐之，又辞。 熙宁三年七月二十八日，沐浴讫，集弟子于前曰：吾俟大风至，即去。 须臾，果风作，如说而化。 后有客自蜀还京，见先生乘白马入蜀，祝云：见吾徒，为言之。 由是知为尸解矣。 尝撰集斋科，及拜章法，及有歌诗行世。 道门通教必用集卷之一竟 原题宋吕太古集。 九卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 道门通教必用集卷之二 鹤林道士吕太古集 词赞篇 启堂颂
chunks.translated_text:
When the emperor’s passing was near, after but a few moments, he suddenly regained his vitality and clarity, and commanded that it be announced: *"Ask the General Bo of what divine origin?"*
**Cóngshàn** replied: *"Beneath the Three Heavens’ Gate stands a deity—the General Bo of Zhōngyuán, who governs the spirit of petitioning."*

Again, the proclamation came: *"Set up his station."*
The next day, the imperial health fully recovered. He instructed his attendants: *"Last night, I reached the Celestial Gate, where General Bo said, ‘The Emperor has not yet arrived; I must borrow a steed to return you swiftly.’ Thus, I awoke."*

The emperor removed his imperial robes, offering gold and silk in gratitude, and sought to bestow upon him the title of *xiānshēng* (Immortal Master). **Cóngshàn** declined with humility.
In the reign of Emperor **Yīngzōng**, the Chancellor **Hán Wèigōng** (Han of the Wei clan) again petitioned for the title to be granted, but he refused once more.

On the twenty-eighth day of the seventh month of **Xīnníng the Third Year**, after bathing in purification, he gathered his disciples and declared: *"I await the great wind’s arrival, then I shall depart."*
Soon after, the wind arose as foretold, and he ascended in transformation.

Later, a traveler returning from **Shǔ** (Sichuan) reported seeing the Master riding a white horse into the region, with the parting words: *"If you encounter my disciples, convey this message to them."*
Thus, it was known that he had achieved *shījiě* (embodied ascension).

He compiled ritual fasting procedures, methods for petitioning the Dao, and left behind hymns and poems in circulation.

chunks.original_text: 学道当勤苦，敛信运丹诚。 烧香归太上，真气杂烟馨。 惟希开大宥，七祖离幽冥。 焚牒颂 璇玑星运转，玉漏响初传。 告牒真官讫，虔诚启醮筵。 忱词祈肸蛮，发露倍精专。 仰望真仙众，依稀下九天。 智慧颂 智慧生戒根，真道戒为主。 三宝由是兴，高真所崇受。 泛此不死舟，倏欻济大有。 当此说戒时，诸天来稽首。 奉戒颂 道为无心宗，一切作福田。 立功无定主，本愿各由人。 虚已应众生，注心莫不均。 大圣崇至教，亦由雨降天。 高陵靡不周，常卑故成渊。 海为百川王，是能舍龙鳞。 万劫保智用，岂但在厥年。 奉戒不暂亏，世世善结缘。 精思念大乘，会当体道真。 请师颂 人各恭敬。 古仪请师，止是经、籍、度三师，作三翻请，且在正坛礼师存念之先，乃自已传度三世之师。 后人不加考究，误以三师为天上仙官，故列为五师。 今既如是，不可复改，可尊五师中三师，为天上郁罗翘真人、真定光真人、光妙音真人。 此乃天台葛仙公授经时，三师亦以见经教，授传之祖，不忘所自也。 如三清，亦号三师，已在正坛奉事，不可降为五师也。 玄中所以主教，当在第一，三师次之，监斋又次之。 修斋行道，奉请玄中大法师降临坛所。 修斋行道，奉请经籍度三师降临坛所。 修斋行道，奉请监斋大法师降临坛所。 云舆已降，鹤驾来临，斋事周圆，还当奉送。 唱道赞 道场众等，人各运心，众和皈命，三宝一切念。 华夏赞 学言学行言。
chunks.translated_text:
「To cultivate the Dao, one must be diligent and earnest, gathering sincerity and refining the elixir of truth.
Burn incense to honor the *Tàishàng Lǎojiūn* (Supreme Venerable),
where the *zhēnqì* (true *qi*) mingles with fragrant smoke.
Only may the Great Compassion be opened,
as the Seventh Patriarch departs from the shadowed realm.
**Hymn of the Offerings**
The *Xuánxī* (Suspended Pivot) stars turn in their course,
the *Yùlòu* (jade water clock) chimes its first resonance.
Having conveyed the offerings to the True Officials,
with devout sincerity, the *qiè* (sacrificial) feast is now begun.
With earnest words, I pray to the *shèmàn* (wild tribes of the south),
my revelation all the more focused and refined.
Gazing upward toward the multitude of True Immortals,
they seem to descend from the Ninth Heaven in faint outline.

**Hymn of Wisdom**
Wisdom arises from the root of *jiè* (precepts),
and the True Dao finds its master in precepts.
From these Three Treasures, all flourishes,
as the Highly Authentic ones revere and accept.
This vessel of non-perishing traverses boundless seas,
in a flash, it crosses the Great Void.
At this moment of preaching precepts,
all the heavens come to pay homage with folded hands.
**Hymn of Revering Precepts**
The Dao is the school of the *wúxīn* (heartless/non-dual) principle,
and all things become fields of merit.
The rewards of deeds are without fixed master,
for each is born from their own original vows.
To empty oneself for all beings,
to pour one’s heart out—none may be excluded.
The Great Sage upholds the utmost teachings,
just as the heavens are nourished by rain.
The lofty peaks are never left unvisited,
yet the humble valleys become profound depths.
The sea is king of all streams,
yet it willingly sheds its dragon scales.
Through countless *jié* (kalpas), wisdom is preserved,
not merely confined to a single age.
To revere precepts brings no loss,
through all lifetimes, one sows good connections.
With focused contemplation, I aspire to the Great Vehicle,
to ultimately embody the True Dao.

**Hymn of Inviting the Master**
All should show reverence.
In ancient rites, inviting the Master refers only to the Three Masters—*Scripture*, *Canon*, and *Transmission*—
and threefold invocation is made.
Even before the proper altar is established to honor the Master’s presence,
it is the *self*-transmitted Three Masters of the Three Worlds.
Later generations failed to examine this closely,
mistaking the Three Masters for celestial Daoist officials,
thus adding them to the Five Masters.
Since this is now the case,
it cannot be altered again—
let the Three Masters among the Five be honored as:
*Yùluóqiào Zhēnrén* (Idyllicly Elevated True Person),
*Zhēndìngguāng Zhēnrén* (True Person of Illuminating Stability),
and *Guāngmiàoyīn Zhēnrén* (True Person of Resplendent Sound).
These are the Three Masters who witnessed the *Scripture* on Tiantai,
the ancestral teachers of transmission,
never forgetting their origins.

As for the *Sānián* (Three Sovereigns),
they are also called the Three Masters,
already revered in the proper altar rites—
they cannot be reduced to the Five Masters.

In the *Xuánzhōng* (Mysterious Central) hierarchy,
the first rank belongs to the Master,
followed by the Three Masters,
then the *Jiānyàn* (Supervising Feast) Grandmasters.
**For rites of fasting and Daoist practice:**
Invite the *Xuánzhōng Dàfǎshī* (Grandmaster of the Mysterious Central) to descend and preside.
**For rites of fasting and Daoist practice:**
Invite the Three Masters—*Scripture*, *Canon*, and *Transmission*—to descend and preside.
**For rites of fasting and Daoist practice:**
Invite the *Jiānyàn Dàfǎshī* (Grandmaster Supervising the Feast) to descend and preside.

When the *yún yǔ* (cloud chariot) has descended,
and the *hè jià* (crane carriage) arrives,
the feast is complete in all its rounds—
then it is time to offer farewell.

**Singing the Daoist Praises**
All assembled at the *Dàocháng* (Daoist Hall),
each focusing their hearts,
united in harmonious reverence,
all Three Treasures invoked in prayer.

**Praise of the Chinese Realm**
To study speech and to study conduct—
both are *xuéyán* (learning of words).」

chunks.original_text: 三启颂三首 乐法以为妻，爱经如珠玉。 持戒制六情，念道遣所欲。 淡泊正气停，萧然神静默。 天魔并敬护，世世受大福。 郁郁家国盛，济济经道兴。 天人同其愿，缥缈入大乘。 因心立福田，靡靡法轮升。 七祖生天堂，我身白日腾。 大道洞玄虚，有念无不契。 炼质入仙真，遂成金刚体。 超度三界难，地狱五苦解。 悉归太上经，尽念稽首礼。 玉京步虚词十首 稽首礼太上，烧香归虚无。 流明随我回，法轮亦三周。 玄愿四大兴，灵庆及王侯。 七祖生天堂，煌煌耀景敷。 啸歌观太漠，天乐适我娱。 齐馨无上德，下仙不与俦。 妙想朗玄觉，诜诜巡虚游。 旋行蹑云纲，乘虚步玄纪。 吟咏帝一尊，百关自调理。 俯命八海撞，仰携高仙子。 诸天散香花，萧然灵风起。 宿愿定命根，故致摽高拟。 欢乐太上前，万劫犹未始。 嵯峨玄都山，十方宗皇一。 岧岧天宝台，光明焰流日。 炜烨玉林华，蒨集耀朱实。 常念餐元精，炼液固形质。 金光散紫微，窈窕大乘逸。 俯仰存太上，华景秀丹田。 左顾提郁仪，右眄拥结璘。 六度观梵行，道德随日新。 宿命积福应，闻经若至亲。 天挺超大才，乐诵希微篇。 冲虚太和气，吐纳流霞精。 胎息静百关，寥寥究三便。 泥丸洞明照，遂成金华仙。 魔王敬受事，故能朝诸天。 皆从斋戒起，累功结宿缘。 飞行凌太虚，提携高上仙。 控辔适十方，旋憩玄景阿。 仰观劫仞台，俯眄紫云罗。 逍遥太上京，相与坐莲花。 积学为真人，恬然荣卫和。 永享无期寿，万椿奚足多。 大道师玄寂，真仙有无英。 公子度灵符，太一捧洞章。 舍利耀金姿，龙驾欻来迎。 天尊眄云兴，飘飘乘虚翔。 香花若飞雪，纷霭茂玄梁。 头脑礼金阙，携手游玉京。 骞树圆景园，焕烂七宝林。 天兽三百名，狮子巨万寻。 飞龙踯躅鸣，神凤应节吟。 灵风扇奇花，清香散人襟。 自无高仙才，焉能此必。 严我九龙驾，乘虚以逍遥。 八天如指掌，六合何足辽。 众仙诵洞经，太上唱清谣。 香花随风散，玉音成紫霄。 五苦一时迸，八难顺经寥。 妙哉灵宝囿，兴此大法桥。 天真帝一宫，霭霭观曜灵，流焕法轮纲，旋空入无形。 虚皇抚云璈，众真诵洞经。 高仙凛手赞，弥劫保利身。 至真无所待，时或辔飞龙。 长斋会玄都，鸣玉叩琼钟。 十华诸仙集，紫烟结成宫。 宝盖罗太上，真人把芙蓉。 散花陈我愿，握节征魔王。 法鼓会群仙，灵唱靡不同。 无可无不可，思与希微通。 金关步虚词 始青黎元盖，金香结朱烟。 飞神总翘辔，稽首玉帝前。 帝心浩以舒，锡吾太灵篇。 是谓不灭道，万天秉吾权。 吾行空洞中，下仙昧其渊。 步虚词十首 太极分高厚，轻清上属天。 人能修至道，身乃作真仙。 行溢三千数，时丁四万年。 丹台开宝笈，金口为流传。 大梵三天主，虚皇五老尊。 尚难窥徽妙，岂复入名言。 宝座临金殿，霞冠照玉轩。 万真朝帝所，飞舄蹑云根。 蒙蒙如细雾，冉冉曳铢衣。 妙逐祥烟上，轻随彩凤飞。 几陪瑶池宴，忽指洞天归。 伫立扶桑岸，高奔日帝晖。 旋步云纲上，天风飒尔吹。 飘裾凌斗柄，秉拂揖参旗，狮子□丹绶，麒麟导翠辎。 飞行周八极，几见发椿枝。 绿鬓颓云髻，青霞络羽衣。 晨趋阳德馆，夜造月华扉。 搏弄周天火，韬藏起陆机。 玉房留不住，却向九霄飞。

Thus, the Master of the **Scripture** takes precedence,
the **Canon** and **Transmission** Masters follow next,
and the **Jiānyàn Dàfǎshī** (Grandmaster Supervising the Feast) ranks below them.

**For Daoist fasting and practice:**
The **Mysterious Central** Grandmaster is revered as the **Léfǎ** (Law of Music),
and the **Scripture** is cherished like pearls and jade.
With **precepts** held firm and the **Six Emotions** subdued,
one recites the **Dao/Way** to dispel all cravings.
In **dampness and stillness**, the **orthodox qi** is stilled,
and in **serene silence**, the spirit finds repose.
Both **celestial demons** and **earthly spirits** are honored and protected,
so that in this life and the next, one attains **great blessings**.

The **Chinese Realm** flourishes in **profound harmony**,
and the **Scripture** and **Dao/Way** thrive in splendor.
Heaven and man share the same aspiration,
and **Lofty and Mysterious** enters the **Great Vehicle**.

**Establishing the Field of Merit through the Mind**,
the **Dharma Wheel** ascends without end.
The **Seven Ancestors** are born in the **Celestial Hall**,
and my body soars like the **White Sun**.

The **Great Dao/Way** penetrates the **Mysterious and Profound**,
and with every thought, none fails to resonate.
Refining the essence, one attains **Immortal Truth**,
and thus becomes a **Golden Body** (Vajra-like).

To **transcend and guide** the **Three Realms** is difficult,
yet the **Five Torments** of the **Underworld** are dissolved.
All return to the **Scripture of the Most High**,
and with every recitation, one prostrates in homage.

**Ten Verses of the Jade Capital (Yùjīng) on Lofty and Mysterious (Xūwú)**
With prostrations to the **Most High**,
incense is burned to return to **Emptiness**.
The **radiant light** follows me back,
and the **Dharma Wheel** revolves three times.
**Mysterious Aspirations** flourish in the **Four Great Elements**,
and **spiritual rejoicing** extends to **kings and nobles**.
The **Seven Ancestors** are born in the **Celestial Hall**,
their **resplendent brilliance** spreading far and wide.

**Singing and dancing** in the **Great Desert’s** vastness,
the **Heavenly Music** delights me in its harmony.
The **fragrance** of the **Supreme Virtue** is unmatched,
and **lower immortals** cannot compare.
**Wondrous thoughts** awaken **profound awareness**,
and **serene** movements traverse **Emptiness**.
With **swift steps** along the **cloudly cords**,
one rides the **Void** and walks the **Mysterious Path**.

**Reciting** to the **Sovereign of Unity**,
all **passes** are naturally regulated.
Gazing downward, one commands the **Eight Seas** to tremble,
and upward, one ascends with **High Immortals**.
The **Heavens** scatter **incense and flowers**,
and the **serene spirit-wind** stirs.
**Past aspirations** are rooted in **destiny’s foundation**,
thus achieving **Lofty and Mysterious** emulation.

With **joy** before the **Most High**,
even **ten thousand kalpas** are but the beginning.
**Majestic** is the **Mysterious Capital Mountain**,
the **Ten Directions** all revere the **Imperial One**.

**Dazzling** is the **Celestial Treasure Platform**,
its **radiant flames** flowing like the sun.
**Gleaming** is the **Jade Forest’s** splendor,
and **clustered** are the **Seven Treasures** of the **Luminous Grove**.
Ever **nourishing** the **Essential Precision**,
one refines the **elixir** to solidify the **form and substance**.
**Golden Light** scatters across **Purple Micro**,
and **Lofty and Mysterious** ascends in **effortless grace**.

Gazing downward and upward, one reveres the **Most High**,
and the **Jade Capital’s** brilliance adorns the **Dan Tian** (Elestial Field).
To the left, one raises the **Idyllic Ritual**,
and to the right, one embraces the **Jade Luminaries**.
With the **Six Perfections**, one observes **Brahman’s conduct**,
and **Daoist Virtue** renews itself daily.
**Past lives’** accumulated **merit** manifests,
and hearing the **Scripture** feels like encountering a **kin**.
The **Heavenly Sovereign** elevates **great talent**,
and one recites **sacred texts** with **profound reverence**.

**Orthodox qi** flows in **Great Harmony**,
and one **inhales and exhales** the **Luminous Elixir**.
**Embryonic Breathing** calms the **Hundred Passes**,
and **Lofty and Serene** explores the **Three Treasures’** essence.
The **Earthly Pill** shines with **illuminating clarity**,
and thus one becomes the **Jade-Hued Immortal**.

The **Demon King** respects and receives this,
so one may **audience the Heavens**.
All begin with **fasting and precepts**,
and through **accumulated merit**, past **karmic ties** are fulfilled.

**Soaring** in the **Great Void**,
one **ascends** with the **Highest Immortals**.
With **reins in hand**, one traverses the **Ten Directions**,
and in **swift rotation**, one rests in the **Mysterious and Profound**.

Gazing upward, one beholds the **Effulgent Platform of the Kalpa**,
and downward, one surveys the **Purple Cloud Array**.
**Adrift in Lofty and Mysterious**,
one sits together on the **Lotus Flower**.

Through **accumulated learning**, one becomes a **True Person**,
and in **serene composure**, the **vital energies** harmonize.
**Endlessly** enjoying **boundless longevity**,
what need is there for **ten thousand autumns**?

The **Great Dao/Way**’s **Master** is **Mysterious and Profound**,
and **True Immortals** possess **unfathomable brilliance**.
The **Prince** transmits **spiritual talismans**,
and **Taiyi** (Great Unity) presents **illuminating scrolls**.
The **Sacred Relics** gleam in **golden splendor**,
and the **Dragon Chariot** swiftly comes to welcome.

The **Heavenly Sovereign** gazes from the **clouds**,
and **floating**, one rides the **Void**.
**Incense and flowers** fall like **flying snow**,
and **abundant** **spiritual winds** adorn the **Mysterious Beams**.

With **head and hands** in homage to the **Golden Gate**,
one **clasps hands** and **wanders** in the **Jade Capital**.
**Circular trees** enclose the **Garden of Radiance**,
and **dazzling** is the **Seven Treasures Forest**.
**Heavenly beasts** number in the **thousands**,
with **Lions** vast in the **ten thousand leagues**.
**Flying Dragons** pace and **roar**,
and the **Divine Phoenix** responds with **melodic chirps**.

**Spirit-winds** fan **wondrous flowers**,
and **pure fragrance** scatters across the **human breast**.
Without **Lofty and Mysterious talent**,
how could one **attain this necessity**?

**Admonish** my **Nine Dragon Chariot**,
and ride the **Void** in **effortless grace**.
The **Eight Heavens** are as near as **one’s fingertips**,
and the **Six Harmonies** are but a **brief span**.
The **multitude of Immortals** recite **sacred texts**,
while the **Most High** sings **pure melodies**.
**Incense and flowers** drift with the **wind**,
and **jade-like sounds** rise to the **Purple Expanse**.

The **Five Torments** burst forth at once,
and the **Eight Difficulties** are overcome by the **Scripture’s** vastness.
**Wondrous** indeed is the **Enclosure of Spirit-Treasures**,
and this **Great Law** is the **Bridge of the Dao/Way**.

The **Celestial Hall of Unity**,
**vague and bright** in its **spiritual radiance**,
the **Dharma Wheel’s** **cord** revolves,
and **Void** enters **formlessness**.

The **Void Sovereign** strokes the **cloudly jade**,
while the **multitude of True Ones** recite **sacred texts**.
**High Immortals** extend their **palms** in praise,
and **through kalpas** they safeguard the **Sacred Body**.

**Absolute Truth** awaits nothing,
yet at times one **guides the flying Dragon**.
**Long fasting** gathers in the **Mysterious Capital**,
and **jade chimes** strike the **Lotus Bell**.

**Ten thousand Immortals** assemble at the **Heavenly Sovereign’s** abode,
their **flying sandals** stepping on the **cloudly roots**.
**Misty** like **fine dew**,
**gradually** they trail **filmy robes**.
**Wondrous** and **light**, they follow **auspicious clouds**,
and **graceful**, they ride the **colorful phoenix**.

Near **accompanying** the **Jade Pool’s** feast,
suddenly one is **pointed** to return to the **Mysterious Heaven**.
Standing still at the **Firmament’s** shore,
one **ascends** to the **radiance of the Sun Sovereign**.

With **swift steps** along the **cloudly cords**,
the **heavenly wind** **rustles** and blows.
**Floating** in the **handle of the Dipper**,
one **holds the broom** and **salutes the celestial flags**,
the **lion** **adorns** the **red sash**,
and the **qilin** leads the **emerald carriage**.

**Soaring** around the **Eight Extremes**,
almost **witnessing** the **chestnut branches** bloom.
**Green locks** cascade in **cloudlike chignons**,
and **blue mists** weave **feathered robes**.
In the **morning**, one **proceeds** to the **Hall of Yang Virtue**,
and at **night**, one **visits** the **Moonlight Gate**.
**Fanning and stirring** the **circular heavenly fire**,
one **conceals and stores** the **spirit of the Sixteen Machines**.

The **Jade Chamber** cannot **detain**,
and one **returns** to the **Nine Heavens** to **fly**.

When the *yún yǔ* (cloud chariot) has descended,
and the *hè jià* (crane carriage) arrives,

chunks.original_text: 昔在延恩殿，中霄降九皇。 六真分左右，黄雾绕轩廊。 广内尊宸御，仙兵护道场。 孝孙今继志，咫尺对灵光。 宝箓修真范，丹诚奏上苍。 冰渊临兆庶，宵旰致平康。 万物消疵疠，三辰效吉祥。 步虚声已彻，更咏洞元章。 宛宛神州地，巍巍众妙坛。 鹤袍来羽客，晃舄下仙官。 玉斝斟元醴，琅函启太丹。 至诚何以祝，四海永澄澜。 水噀魔宫慑，灯开夜府明，九天风静默，四极气澄清。 啸咏朱陵曲，翱翔白玉京。 至诚何以祝，国祚永安荣。 华夏吟哦远，人声自抑扬。 冲虚归道德，曲折合宫商。 殿阁沉檀散。 楼台月露凉。 至诚何以祝，多稼永丰禳。 玉清乐 地居天上接空居，万象森罗遍八区。 功用不知谁主宰，绛霞丹雾閟清都。 碧落空歌黍米珠，十方勃勃入无余。 闻经庆喜难言说，九色龙腾八景舆。 五色云营叆叆屯，三三洞户敞琼门。 何方道士通朱表，玉女飞函达上尊。 上清乐 紫清天上育华林，绛实朱柯竹叶深。 咀嚼繁英身不老，下观乌兔换光阴。 元君八气号青灵，锦帔飞裙住玉城。 把握帝符司道籍，被除尘累济群生。 九日宫中四老真，广霞山上宴仙宾。 鸣钟鼓瑟行灵醋，碧落融融别有春。 太清乐 太一元君掌列仙，彤辉绛彩射芝田。 功圆会遇刊冥籍，可待洪崖笑拍肩。 金阙明光后圣君，流精焕彩结丹云。 不因太上相传授，安得人间有玉文。 五节清香半夜焚，天人玉女尽遥闻。 味同气合遥相应，绛节霓旌下五云。 白鹤词 白鹤初生在紫微，且当洞府养毛衣。 借问仙人何日至，莫言不解伴云飞。 白鹤千年始一归，山川依旧世人非。 不因华表分明语，谁识当初丁令威。 白鹤飞来下九天，数声嘹喨出祥烟。 日月相催人易老，不如修道学神仙。 太一真人冰雪容，步虚来往本无踪。 蓬莱要去而今去，蕾买在窗前鹤在松。 白鹤天生寿命长，翱翔仙境侍虚皇。 千春一到华旌上，却归霄汉自然乡。 白鹤飞翔在玉京，往来三界现长生。 修行若达神仙境，便乘真驭入云庭。 白鹤词 白鹤凝霜一顶红，常居碧落杳冥中。 三清好是逍遥处，天上人间事不同。 白鹤词 八景戒期登秘宇，九清敷佑协祥经。 曾云颉顽瞻仙羽，暴日徘徊在福庭。 白鹤词 胎化灵禽唳九天，雪毛丹顶两相鲜。 世人莫认归华表，来瑞升平亿万年。 出堂颂 道以斋为先，勤行登金阙。
chunks.translated_text:
The **White Crane Hymns**

**White Crane** at first was born in **Purple Forbidden**,
and now **dwells** in the **Celestial Abode** to nurture **feathered robes**.
**Asking** the **Daoist Immortal** when **one shall depart**,
**do not say** one **cannot** **accompany** the **clouds** in flight.

The **White Crane** returns to the **Nine Heavens** after **thousand springs**,
while **mountains and rivers** remain unchanged—**mortals** are not.
Had it not been for the **Clear Proclamation** of **Ding Lingwei**,
who would **recognize** the **White Crane** of old?

The **White Crane** **flies** down from the **Nine Heavens**,
its **clear calls** **piercing** through **auspicious mists**.
The **sun and moon** **urge** one another—**mortals** age swiftly,
yet **better** to **cultivate the Dao** and **learn from the Immortals**.

The **Virtuous Sovereign of Great Unity** has a **snow-white visage**,
**Soaring in the Void**, coming and going with **no trace**.
**Penglai** must be **sought**—and now **one goes**,
while the **qilin** **stands** at the window, the **crane** among the **pines**.

The **White Crane**, born of **Heaven**, has a **long lifespan**,
**soaring** in the **Immortal Realm**, attending the **Void Sovereign**.
When **thousand springs** arrive at the **Clear Proclamation**,
**one returns** to the **Nine Heavens**, the **Natural Homeland**.

The **White Crane** **flies** in the **Jade Capital**,
**traversing** the **Three Realms**, **manifesting** **Eternal Life**.
If **cultivation** reaches the **Immortal Realm**,
**one shall ride** the **True Vehicle** into the **Cloud Court**.

---

**White Crane Hymns**
The **White Crane**, **congealed** in **frost**, wears a **crimson crest**,
**Ever dwelling** in the **Empty Verdant** **withdrawn** in mystery.
The **Three Pure Ones** **love** this **place of carefree ease**,
for **Heavenly** and **Earthly** affairs are **not the same**.

---

**White Crane Hymns**
At the **Eight Scenic** **period**, **ascend** to the **Forbidden Palace**,
and the **Nine Pure Ones** **bestow blessings** with the **Auspicious Scriptures**.
Once **one spoke** of **playful antics** and **gazed** upon **Immortal Feathers**,
and **under the fierce sun**, **one lingered** in the **Court of Fortune**.

---

**White Crane Hymns**
**Incubated** and **transformed**, the **Soulbird** **calls** from the **Nine Heavens**,
with **snow-white plumage** and **crimson crest**—both **radiant**.
**Mortals**, **do not mistake** this **return** to the **Clear Proclamation**,
for it **brings auspicious omens**—**prosperity** for **ten thousand years**.

---

**Hymn of Departure**
**The Dao** **begins** with **fasting**,
**diligent practice** leads **one** to the **Golden Gate**.

---

**The Music of the Jade Purity**
In the **Purple Pure** **Heavens**, the **Flowery Forest** **nurtures** life,
where the **Crimson Realms** and **Jade Branches** **hide** deep **bamboo leaves**.
**Chewing** and **savoring** **abundant blossoms**, **one’s body** **does not age**,
**Gazing downward**, **one observes** the **Black Hare** **changing** **light and shadow**.

The **Original Sovereign** is **known** as the **Eight Qi** **Green Spirit**,
with **brocade robes** **fluttering** in **flying skirts**, **dwelling** in the **Jade City**.
**Holding** the **Imperial Talisman**, **one governs** the **Daoist Register**,
**Removing** **dust and filth**, **one aids** the **multitude of living beings**.

In the **Nine-Day Palace**, the **Four Elderly Immortals** **gather**,
and at the **Mountain of Broad Mists**, **one feasts** the **Celestial Guests**.
**Resounding bells** and **plucked strings** **move** the **Spiritual Wine**,
while the **Empty Verdant** **melts** in warmth—**another spring** **emerges**.

---

**The Music of the Supreme Purity**
The **Original Sovereign of Great Unity** **commands** the **ranked Immortals**,
with **scarlet radiance** and **crimson hues** **illuminating** the **Cinnabar Fields**.
**Perfect merit** **encounters** **those who erase** the **Dark Register**,
and **one awaits** the **Laughing Scholar of Hongya** **to clap the shoulder**.

Behind the **Golden Gate**, the **Luminous Sovereign** **shines**,
**Emitting essence**, **one’s brilliance** **forms** the **Cinnabar Clouds**.
Had it not been for the **Supreme Sage** **passing on** the **transmission**,
how could **mortals** possess the **Jade Texts**?

At **midnight**, the **Five Nodes** **burn** with **pure incense**,
and **Heavenly** and **Human** **Immortal Maidens** all **hear** from afar.
**Flavors** and **breaths** **harmonize**, **one responds** in **unison**,

**Yingdu** **honors** these **words**.

**Liberating** all **karmic obstacles**,
**Pledging** to **sever** **guilt** and **transgressions**.

The **Nine Abysses** **all attain** **liberation**,
**Lost souls** **ascend** to the **Nine Heavens**.

**The Hymn of the Mountain Degrees**
**Invoking the True**, I **ascend** the **Purple Peak**,
**Declaring** my **fate** at the **Numinous Mountain Altar**.

**Jade Maidens** **chant** **dharma** in **celestial harmony**,
**Golden Boys** **scatter** **fragrant incense smoke**.

**Names** are **recorded** through the **Nine Earths**,
**Characters** **ascend** to the **Three Heavens**.

**Endlessly** **enjoy** **longevity** **without bounds**,
**Fully** **attain** the **Highest Immortal**.

**The Hymn of the Water Degrees**
**Heavenly Lord** **preserves** the **precepts and laws**,
**Supreme Sage** **performs** the **True Scriptures**.

**Upholding the Law** **must** be **diligent and suffering**,
**Meritorious deeds** **value** **sincerity and purity**.

With **devoted heart**, I **invoke** the **Three Treasures**,
**Burning incense**, I **declare** to the **Hundred Spirits**.

**Names** are **inscribed** in the **Water Bureau**,
**Merits** **reach** the **Upper Clarity**.

**The Hymn of the Three Realms and Five Sufferings**
**Three Powers** and **Ten Thousand Beings**,
**Dependent** and **submissive**, each **has** its **allotted span**.

**Beginning and end** **cycle** through **eons**,
**Fortune exhausted**, **Heaven and Earth** **tilt**.

**Traveling** **between** the **Five Paths**,
**Suffering!** **Again and again** **through life and death**.

**Wandering** in the **Three Realms**,
**Coming and going** with **calamity**.

**The Hymn of the Bright Lamp**
**The Great Dao** **pervades** the **Ten Directions**,
**Flower Lamps** **illuminate** **sincere devotion**.

All **Heavenly Beings** **open** their **radiance**,
The **Nine Earths** **all grow** **bright and clear**.

My **body** **too** **shines** through,
**Five Viscera** **bloom** with **floral splendor**.

**Fiery light** **illuminates** the **Supreme Void**,
**Distant thoughts** **communicate** with **Jade Capital**.

**The Dance of Scattering Flowers**
**Scattering Flowers Grove**,
**Scattering Fragrance Grove**,
**Scattering Fragrance and Flowers**,
**Filling** the **Dao Hall**,
Before the **Supreme True** **offerings**.

**Jade Capital Mountain** **above**, **homage** to the **True Assembly**,
**Scattering Flowers Grove**—**Ten Immortals** **align** in **harmonized steps**,
**Filling** the **Dao Hall**,
Before the **Most True** **offerings**.

**Voiceless** **unison** **from** the **Moon’s descent**,
**Steps of the Void** **threefold** **enter** the **clouds**.

**Ancient Dance of Scattering Flowers**
**Primordial Origin** **transmits words**, all **accept** the **Degrees**,
**Dao Sovereign** **opens teachings**, all **return** in **surrender**.

In **Small Possession Cave** **three** **auspicious grasses**,
On **Jade Capital Mountain** **ten thousand years’ peaches**.

**Five-colored clouds** **display** the **Rainbow Phoenix**,
**One incense burner** **wraps** the **golden mane**.

**Three True** **Jade Maidens** **hold** the **Flower Rites**,
**One pair** of **Boys** **bear** the **Golden Incense**.

**Five-colored clouds** **cover** the **Earth**,
**Nine Heavens’ True Qi** **envelops** the **Incense Altar**.

At the **Nine Dragons Gate** **above**, the **True Sages** **congregate**,
By the **Eight Immortals Platform**, they **listen** to the **Pure Melodies**.

From the **Three Islands**, **Feathered Folk** **pay homage** at the **Elephant Gate**,
From the **Nine Heavens**, **Celestial Children** **descend** to the **Myriad Jade Terrace**.

**Five-colored clouds** **rise** with the **steps**,
**Sixfold Immortal Robes** **adorn** the **body**.

**Feathered Folk** of the **Three Islands** **take** their **seats**,
**Luan Cranes** of the **Ten Realms** **lead** the **ascent** to **Heaven**.

**Supreme Sage** **scatters flowers**, **declaring** my **vows**,
**Striking bells**, **beating drums**, **gathering** the **assembly of Immortals**.

**Ten thousand lotus lamps** **blaze** in the **night moon**,
**Fragrant incense** **fills** the **altar** with **Heavenly Flowers**.

**Five-Character Dance of Scattering Flowers**
**Crimson Rites** **hover** in **circles**,
**Heavenly Flowers** **scatter** in **waves**.

**High True** **untainted** **attire**,
Each **petal** **does not** **cling** to the **garment**.

**Sage Realm** **three thousand years**,
**Immortal Flowers** **begin** to **blossom**.

How **can** the **Golden Degrees Assembly** **gather**,
All **pay homage** to the **aligned Immortals**?

**Eightfold Steps** **ascend** the **Myriad Jade Terrace**,
**Thousand Flowers** **ripples** the **Embroidered Brocade**.

**Sixfold Purity** **unites** with **Azure** **[]**,
**Resplendent** **beyond** **naming**.

**Shallow** **shallow** **golden calyxes**,
**Even** **even** **jade petals**.

**Heavenly Wind** **follows** the **feathered canopy**,
**Blowing** **through** the **Ninefold Celestial City**.

**Graceful** **and elegant** **in the void**,
**Multicolored** **petals** **fall** at the **seat’s edge**.

**Eternal Splendor** **never ages**,
Where **to seek** the **Immortal Capital**?

**Pure Companions** **sing** the **Immortal Tunes**,
All **praise** the **virtuous** and **good**.

**Ten thousand flowers** **blossom** in **offerings**,
**Dancing** **ascends** from **Heaven**.

**Jade Leaves** **open** the **Ki Garden**,
**Precious Branches** **stand** in **Purple Micro**.

**Not allowing** **butterflies** to **pick**,
**Endlessly** **accompany** the **Rainbow Cranes**.

**Several Seats** **extend** the **Gale Chariots**,
**Incense Lamps** **build** the **Treasure Altars**.

**Crimson Heart** **has nothing** to **offer**,
**Shattered Brocade** **pours** at the **Cloud’s End**.

**Green and Azure** **differ** in **sequence**,
**Red and Yellow** **create** **shallow depths**.

**Alchemical Art** **responds** in **self-loss**,
**Carving and chiseling**—**what** was the **original intent**?

**Piercing** the **incense burner’s smoke**,
**Dao** **without action** **is the** **Moral Fragrance**.

**Same root**, **no different qi**,
**Fragrant breath** **even more** **exalted**.

**The Scattering Flowers Words**
**Heaven’s spring** **endures** **forever**,
**Flowers bloom** **without** **counting time**.

On the **Myriad Jade Terrace**, **auspicious mists** **descend**,
**Fragrant qi** **even more** **abundant**.

**Jade Cosmos** **opens** **thousand gates**,
**Golden Incense** **harmonizes** **a hundred times**.

**Fragrant** **fills** the **Law Seat**,
**Only** **[]** **awaits** the **gathered Immortals**.

**Voiceless clouds** **wrap** **endless flowers**,
**Primordial Life** **ascends** to the **Jade Emperor’s Palace**.

**Only** **to visit** the **Peaceful Retreat**,
**Not** **to chase** the **Harmonious Winds**.

**The Hymn of Burning the Crimson Tablets**
**Supreme Void** **encompasses** the **Cosmic Form**,
**Most True Dao** **is** **fathomless** **without shape**.

**Divine Harmony** **communicates** with **Mystic Qi**,
**Responsive** **sensations** **reach** the **innermost heart**.

**Swiftly** **and suddenly** **circuiting** the **Eight Extremes**,
**Vaguely** **descending** to the **Ten Thousand Spirits**.

**Scattering flowers**, **offering** **sincere devotion**,
**Surrendering** my **body** with **crimson sincerity**.

**Distant** **soaring** on **Luan Cranes’ canopies**,
**Far** **ascending** on **Rainbow Phoenix’s banners**.

**Smoke Palace** **towers** in **lofty grandeur**,
**Cloud Gates** **stand** **erect** **above**.

chunks.original_text: 琼凤出霄汉，金龙入太清。 甘露洽人世，景福被幽冥。 解坛颂 眇眇空无象，悠悠感有情。 敬则垂天贶，亵则被魔精。 吉凶随运起，否泰应缘生。 道不贵珠玉，神惟在至诚。 丹碧尽勤苦，恳欵竭衷情。 自然通大圣，皆得降明灵。 捻香陈所愿，稽首冀嘉祯。 天尊常寂静，回心礼杳冥。 还戒颂 天尊大慈悲，说戒度众生。 威德被幽显，果报感真灵。 诸天来稽首，群魔自束形。 过去超八苦，见在保安宁。 斋福行当息，相共送天真。 流梵逸云响，飞香杂烟馨。 琼凤乘丹辇，金龙驾绿軿。 生往皆快乐，家国悉安宁。 辞师颂 修斋已讫，仰荷洪恩，稽首归依，奉辞玄中大法师。 经法虽玄妙，崇奉悉因师。 凡欲立善者，成当礼敬之。 气专功易就，心慢悔难追。 若能勤系念，朝夕自仙飞。 修斋已讫，仰荷洪恩，稽首归依，奉辞经、籍、度三师。 道以斋为重，法以朝为常。 不信不奉者，焉能游帝乡。 有骨入仙品，自然开紫房。 玉女登云台，但见金银房。 是故谢三师，稽首礼虚皇。 修斋已讫，仰荷洪恩，稽首皈依，奉辞监斋大法师。 迢迢玉京山，仙都高巍巍。 众真乘虚步，朗朗长夜开。 大道由人信，心至神自归。 修斋行道讫，稽首辞正师。 云舆弗驻，鹤驾难留。 后有告祈，还当奉请。 向来修斋功德，上祝皇帝圣寿无疆，咸赖善功，成无上道，一切信礼。 奉送赞每句下有散花林三字 奉送诸天仙，金童捧金莲。 玉女扬琪花，直上宝台前。 难思议赞每句下和难思议 碧落天中法会时，宝珠初现甚纤微。 大圣珠中传妙道，无边圣众尽相随。 祝镇天真文出九天生神齐仪 玄上高灵，元始尊神，大圣徘徊，万真临轩。 三景散晖，瑞云四陈，上吉较图，推算九天。 丹书赤字，自然真文，上告五帝，记名玉篇。 万神监映，日月盟言，愿度愿生，愿神愿仙。 天地星宿，玄照帝、我身，三官九府，五岳大神，溥告无穷，削除罪根。 修斋行道，请福祈恩，元始大明，莫不纳言。 得与三景，同晖紫晨，轮转不灭，身得飞仙。 炼度真文 元始太帝，高上玉皇，八天符命，普告十方，无上无下，无极神乡。 三十二天，隐韵灵章，五文结气，八会流光。 今日大宥，万善敷张，定名仙图，列籍紫房。 修斋行道，用拔先亡，幽关超度，冥夜开光。 超登三界，景侍虚皇，冢讼绝息，见在兴昌。 万灵监映，福禄殊常，灾凶扫荡，眷属安康。 请如所告，金马腾骧。 又一首 无上至真，大圣高真，布化运气，三十二天。 八会九光，自然成真，安镇天地。 保制劫年。 元始符命，普告三元，下勑九地，上闻诸天，中告海岳，名山大川。 今日上告，万神咸闻，修斋行道，拔度幽魂，三官九府，削灭罪根，永度三涂，五苦之源，代代受福，记名丹篇，神生福堂，炼化自然，生死开度，亿劫长存，九天符命，金马驿传。 五方消灾真文正字 东方青帝消灾真文：岁星辅肝，角亢正真，氏房心尾，四景回旋，箕主七辰，正斗明轮，承气捕非，扫除灾群。 南方赤帝消灾真文：荧惑辅心，井鬼守房，柳星张翼，抗御四乡，轸主七宿，回转天常，召运保会，正道驿行。 西方白帝消灾真文：太白检肺，奎娄守魂，胃昂毕觜，主制七关，参总斗魁，受符北元。 北方黑帝消灾真文：北辰辅肾，斗牛卫扉，女虚危室，豁落四开，壁总七星，执凶纠非，却灾扫秽，明道轮晖。
chunks.translated_text:
**Precious Phoenix Emerges from the Celestial Expanse, Golden Dragon Enters the Supreme Clarity**
**Sweet Dew Permeates the Human Realm, Auspicious Fortune Covers the Profound Darkness**

**Sutra of the Crimson Tablets**
**Vast and boundless** **the Void** **holds no form**,
**Endless and profound** **the Dao** **stirs responsive feelings**.

With **reverence**, **Heaven’s blessings descend**,
With **irreverence**, **one is ensnared by demonic forces**.
**Fortune and misfortune arise with fate’s movement**,
**Calamity and prosperity follow karmic roots**.

The **Dao** **does not value jade and pearls**,
The **divine** **resides only in utmost sincerity**.
**Crimson and verdant** **are achieved through ceaseless toil**,
**Sincere devotion** **exhausts the innermost heart**.

**Naturally** **communicating with the Great Sage**,
**All attain descent of the luminous spirits**.
**Burning incense**, **offering earnest prayers**,
**Kneeling in hope of Heaven’s gracious favor**.

**Heavenly Lord** **abides in eternal stillness**,
**Returning the heart** **to worship the boundless darkness**.

**Sutra of the Returning Precept**
**Heavenly Lord** **of boundless compassion**,
**Expounds precepts** **to guide all beings**.

His **virtue and awe** **pervade both seen and unseen**,
**Karmic fruits** **are felt by the true spirits**.
**All Celestial Beings** **come to kneel in homage**,
**Demon hosts** **themselves restrain their forms**.

**Past sufferings** **transcend the Eight Torments**,
**Present life** **secures peace and safety**.
**Fasting brings blessings**—**let deeds now cease**,
**Together we send forth the Heavenly Pure**.

**Echoes of the Dharma** **drift with cloudy responses**,
**Flying fragrance** **mingles with smoky incandescence**.
**Phoenix of jade** **rides the crimson palanquin**,
**Dragon of gold** **drives the green sedan-chair**.

**Life and death alike bring joy**,
**Households and nations all find tranquility**.

**Sutra of Farewell to the Teacher**
**Fasting rites now complete**,
**I receive vast grace**,
**Kneel in devotion**,
**And humbly take leave of the Supreme Daoist Master**.

Though **scriptures and teachings** **are profound and wondrous**,
**Reverence arises solely from the Master**.
**All who seek to establish goodness**,
**Should follow in homage**.

**Qi focused**, **the work is swiftly attained**,
**The heart negligent**, **regret follows, hard to undo**.
If **one diligently holds the thought**,
**Morning and evening** **ascends as a transcendent**.

**Fasting rites now complete**,
**I receive vast grace**,
**Kneel in devotion**,
**And take leave of the Three Masters of Scripture, Canon, and Guidance**.

The **Dao** **holds fasting as paramount**,
**The law** **demands daily devotion**.
**Without faith or reverence**,
**How could one wander in the Imperial Realm?**

With **bone** **one enters the ranks of the transcendent**,
**Naturally** **the Purple Chamber opens**.
**Jade Maidens** **ascend the Cloud Platform**,
**Only the Golden Silver Chambers are seen**.

Thus, **I thank the Three Masters**,
**Kneel in homage to the Celestial Sovereign**.

**Fasting rites now complete**,
**I receive vast grace**,
**Kneel in devotion**,
**And take leave of the Master Overseeing Fasts**.

**Lofty and distant** **the Jade Capital’s peaks**,
**The Daoist City** **soars in grandeur**.
**All True Ones** **ride upon the void**,
**Bright and clear** **through endless night**.

The **Great Dao** **depends on human trust**,
**The heart sincere** **the divine naturally returns**.

**Fasting rites and Daoist practice now complete**,
**I kneel in farewell to the Rightful Teacher**.
**Cloud chariots** **do not linger**,
**Crane palanquins** **cannot be detained**.

Should **future supplications** **arise**,
**I shall still offer requests**.

**Prior fasting merits** **now presented**,
**Above all** **I pray for the Emperor’s eternal sacred life**,
**All rely on virtuous deeds**,
**To attain the peerless Dao**,
**And universal reverence**.

**Delivered with scattered flowers beneath each line**
**I send forth all Celestial Sages**,
**Golden Boys** **bear golden lotuses**.
**Jade Maidens** **wave fragrant blossoms**,
**Ascending straight to the Jewel Platform’s fore**.

**Beneath each line: "Difficult to Conceive"**
**In the Verdant Abyss’s Dharma Assembly**,
**Jewel Pearls** **first appear, so delicate and fine**.
**The Great Sage** **within the pearls transmits wondrous teachings**,
**Limitless holy multitudes** **follow in procession**.

**Prayer for the Celestial Lord’s Auspicious Decree, from the Nine Heavens**
**Highest Mystic Sovereign**,
**Primeval Venerable Deity**,
**Great Sage lingering**,
**Ten Thousand Spirits** **gather at the hall**.

**Three Radiant Ones** **scatter their light**,
**Auspicious clouds** **display in fourfold array**,
**Comparing celestial omens**,
**Calculating the Nine Heavens**.

**Crimson script** **with scarlet characters**,
**Naturally** **the true decrees emerge**,
**Reporting to the Five Emperors**,
**Recording names in the Jade Register**.

**Ten Thousand Spirits** **witness and reflect**,
**Sun and Moon** **pledge their oaths**,
**The living and the dead**,
**The spirits and the transcendent**,
**All Heaven and Earth’s constellations**,
**Illuminated by the Mystic Emperor’s radiance**,
**The Three Officials and Nine Ministries**,
**The Five Sacred Mountains’ Great Deities**,
**Widely proclaimed without end**,
**Severing the roots of sin**.

**Fasting rites and Daoist practice**,
**Seeking blessings and praying for grace**,
**Primeval Bright Sovereign**,
**None refuse the petitions**.

**Granted union with the Three Radiant Ones**,
**Together we shine in the Purple Dawn**,
**Revolving without cessation**,
**The body ascends as a transcendent**.

**Refined Decrees for the True Spirits**
**Primeval Sovereign Emperor**,
**Highest Jade Emperor**,
**Eight Heaven’s seals of command**,
**Universally proclaimed to the Ten Directions**,
**Without surpassing or being surpassed**,
**The boundless realm of the divine**.

**Thirty-Two Heavens**,
**Hidden verses of the numinous chapter**,
**Five characters** **concentrate the qi**,
**Eight assemblies** **flow with luminous light**.
**This day’s great pardon**,
**All goodness unfurls**,
**Fixed names in the Daoist diagram**,
**Listed in the Purple Chamber’s register**.

**Fasting rites and Daoist practice**,
**Used to rescue the departed**,
**Supernal passages** **for crossing the void**,
**Midnight illuminations** **for opening the way**.
**Ascending beyond the Three Realms**,
**Attending the Celestial Sovereign**,
**Ancestral disputes** **cease to trouble**,
**Present life** **flourishes in prosperity**.

**Ten Thousand Spirits** **witness and reflect**,
**Blessings and longevity** **are extraordinary**,
**Disasters and calamities** **are swept away**,
**Relatives and kin** **are safe and healthy**.

**As told, the Golden Horse** **gallops in response**.

**Another Verse**
**Supreme and Peerless True One**,
**Great Sage of Highest Virtue**,
**Dispensing transformations** **with the flowing qi**,
**Thirty-Two Heavens**.

**Eight assemblies, nine luminous lights**,
**Naturally** **perfected in truth**,
**Securing and pacifying Heaven and Earth**,
**Preserving the cosmic cycles**.

**Primeval seals of command**,
**Universally proclaimed to the Three Primordials**,
**Descending edicts to the Nine Earths**,
**Ascending to hear the Celestial Hosts**,
**Midway informing the seas and mountains**,
**Great peaks and vast rivers**.

**This day’s proclamation**,
**All spirits hear**,
**Fasting rites and Daoist practice**,
**Rescuing and guiding the departed souls**,
**The Three Officials and Nine Ministries**,
**Severing and extinguishing the roots of sin**,
**Permanently crossing the Three Abysses**,
**The source of the Five Torments**,
**Generation after generation receiving blessings**,
**Names recorded in the Crimson Register**,
**The spirit born in the Hall of Blessings**,
**Refined naturally**,
**Life and death’s passage opened**,
**A hundred kalpas** **long preserved**,
**Nine Heaven’s seals of command**,
**Golden Horse’s courier transmission**.

**True Decrees for Disaster Elimination in the Five Directions**
**Eastern Azure Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating Decree**:
**The Year Star aids the Liver**,
**The Horn and Ox** **uphold the true and the pure**,
**The Room and Heart** **guard the essence**,
**Four luminous ones revolve in harmony**,
**The Dipper** **commands the Seven Stars**,
**The Dipper’s Wheel** **clears the luminous path**,
**Capturing malevolent qi**,
**Sweeping away all calamitous hosts**.

**Southern Vermilion Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating Decree**:
**The Wandering Star aids the Heart**,
**The Well and Ghost** **guard the Room**,
**The Willow Star unfurls its wings**,
**Resisting the Four Quarters**,
**The Dipper’s Seven Constellations** **return to their celestial order**,
**Summoning the auspicious** **to guard the assembly**,
**The true Dao’s courier** **proceeds in righteousness**.

**Western White Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating Decree**:
**The Great White Star inspects the Lung**,
**The Knee and Roof** **guard the soul**,
**The Stomach and Ox** **command the Seven Barriers**,
**The Dipper’s Seven Stars** **total the celestial pole**,
**Receiving the seal from the Northern Primordial**.

**Northern Black Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating Decree**:
**The North Star aids the Kidney**,
**The Dipper and Bull** **guard the gate**,
**The Female Void and Peril** **oversee the chamber**,
**The Fourfold Abyss opens wide**,
**The Wall’s Seven Stars** **summon the malevolent**,
**Detaining the guilty**,
**Repelling disasters**,
**Sweeping away filth**,
**Illuminating the Dao’s revolving light**.

chunks.original_text: 中央黄帝消灾真文：镇星辅脾，回度北元，□□主非，截邪斩根，□□□□，扫秽除氛，□正玄斗，明度天关，九天符命，金马驿传。 祝消灾真文 元始上天，三光高明，回景照曜，四方肃清，运度所冲，激扬流星，五分错越，三统失宁，五斗总辰，七宿明灵。 真君大魁，厥讳玉精。 夫人皇妃，字曰育婴，总御仙关，回转诸天。 今有弟子，恐有灾星，悬告不祥，请以真文，赤书上陈，散发谢愆，披露丹诚，乞垂玄监，回复天经，气不妄越，灾不横生，焚烧真文，散烟玉庭，上景监度，普告万灵，气清三关，灾灭九冥，阴阳调和，眷属安宁，请以真文，风火驿传。 祝符戒 元始上圣，玉帝高真，丹文告命，济死度生。 金箓妙戒，拯度幽冥。 白简宝符，九真仙经，解削罪咎，冤债和平。 救苦真人，削除罪刑。 察命童子，注上生名。 护戒威神，引诣福庭。 超离五苦，乘驾云軿，轮转得道，飞升上清。 祝茭龙 元始符命，下入重泉，幽关夜府，罪苦衔冤，通幽负信，鱼龙告宣，魂魄受炼，得离冥关，神公往化，上升三天，一如告命，菱龙驿传。 十二念 一念天地交泰，二念大道兴行，三念阴阳吋序，四念日月齐明，五念庙社安泰，六念圣算延龄，七念兆民康辑，八念百谷丰盈，九念异人间出，十念灾害不生，十一念休祥荐至，十二念治定功成。 十二愿 一愿乾亨坤顺，二愿道尊德隆，三愿五行不忒，四愿九庙来崇，五愿一人有庆，六愿四海会同，七愿万物茂遂，八愿百谷滋丰，九愿君唱臣和，十愿俗洽时雍，十一愿与道合契，十二愿亿载无穷。 又 一愿乾坤明素，二愿气象清玄，三愿圣人万寿，四愿化洽八埏，五愿天垂甘露，六愿地发祥烟，七愿四时应节，八愿百物生全，九愿家多孝悌，十愿国富才贤，十一愿酆都罢对，十二愿学道成仙。 古仪十二愿念，总括无遗，方见愿力之广，以是愿念，回向家国幽明。 盖科仪中文意，亦复如此，信古仪之尽善也。 如巢观先生愿念，则不然。 为国专以国事，荐幽专以迁拔，消灾专以祈禳。 盖其所着之仪，亦复如此故也。 今并录之，俾行持者自择。 巢仪十二念为国 一念天无氛秽，二念地无妖尘，三念神风静默，四念日月照明，五念八景冥合，六念十方肃清，七念普受开度，八念民称太平，九念万神侍卫，十念诸天书名，十一念功德甚重，十二念咸得长生。 又迁拔 一愿人无夭横，二愿泽及漏泉，三愿冤仇解释，四愿苦爽升迁，五愿冢讼俱息，六愿复连不缠，七愿九龙驰命，八愿魂门炼仙，九愿幽牢罢对，十愿七祖生天，十一愿朱陵受度，十二愿坐致自然。 又消灾 一愿阖门康健，二愿父母长生，三愿万邪归正，四愿众恶不萌，五愿五路通达，六愿宅舍安宁，七愿营业称遂，八愿六畜兴生，九愿疾病痊差，十愿财物丰盈，十一愿横事不起，十二愿永亨利贞。 普供养赞 人各存念，注想天尊，稽首归依，焚香供养。 愿香气氤氲，遍满十方界，上至无上大罗天、仙都玉京、萧台绛阖、七宝紫微宫，元始天尊、虚皇太上、十方众圣、三境真仙、宝藏灵文、玄中教主，敬发心回向，同入法门。 愿以此香烟，虔诚供养，供养普遍，皈命礼至真三宝。 祝八威真文安坟、安宅 三光开明，回转天常，运推数终，百六乘纲。
chunks.translated_text:
**Central Yellow Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating True Scripture**:
**The Settling Star aids the Spleen**,
**The Returning Degree summons the Northern Primordial**,
**[□□] commands the unrighteous**,
**Severing evil and cutting its roots**,
**[□□□□]**, sweeping away filth and dispelling malevolent *qi*,
**The [□□] aligns with the Dipper’s Pole**,
**Illuminating the Dao’s celestial barriers**,
**The Nine-Heaven Seal Decree**,
**The Golden Horse Courier transmits**.

**Prayer for Disaster Elimination**:
**The Primordial Sovereign ascends to Heaven**,
**The Three Lights shine resplendent**,
**The Returning Radiance illuminates and clarifies**,
**The Four Quarters purified in solemnity**,
**The Degree transmitted to counter the assaults**,
**The Stirring and Ascending Comet**,
**The Five Divisions in disorder, the Three Systems unsettled**,
**The Five Dipper Stars gather the celestial pole**,
**The Seven Barriers reveal the numinous**.

**True Lord’s Great Command**:
**His taboo is the Jade Essence**.

**The Sovereign’s Consort, Empress Royal**:
**Her given name is Nurturing Infant**,
**She governs all the Celestial Passes**,
**And revolves the myriad heavens**.

Now, **my disciples** fear the **Disaster Star**,
**Hanging warnings of inauspiciousness**,
**Requesting this True Scripture**,
**With red ink inscribed and presented**,
**Scattering their hair in repentance**,
**Baring their hearts in sincerity**,
**Praying for the Dao’s mysterious oversight**,
**To restore the Heavenly Order**,
**So that *qi* does not stray recklessly**,
**And disasters do not arise unchecked**,
**Burning this True Scripture**,
**Dispersing its smoke to the Jade Courtyard**,
**Offering the Radiance to the Oversight Degree**,
**Announcing universally to all spirits**,
**Clearing *qi* through the Three Barriers**,
**Extinguishing disasters in the Nine Dark Realms**,
**Balancing yin and yang**,
**Ensuring kinfolk dwell in peace**,
**Requesting this True Scripture**,
**To be transmitted by the Windfire Courier**.

**Prayer Scripture Taboo**:
**The Primordial Sovereign ascends to holiness**,
**The Jade Emperor, lofty and true**,
**The Red Scripture proclaims the Decree**,
**Rescuing the dead and guiding the living**.

**The Golden Talisman’s Marvelous Taboo**,
**Delivering those trapped in the Dark Realms**.
**The White Tablet’s Precious Seal**,
**The Nine-True Scripture of the Celestial Dao**,
**Removing guilt and expiating sin**,
**Dissolving grievances and granting harmony**.
**The True Person who Relieves Suffering**,
**Removes crimes and eradicates punishments**.
**The Child who Scrutinizes Fate**,
**Records the names of the living**.
**The Protective Taboo’s Mighty Spirit**,
**Guides them to the Blessed Courtyard**.
**Rising above the Five Torments**,
**Ascending in the Cloud Palanquin**,
**Revolving to attain the Dao**,
**Flying to the Upper Clarity**.

**Prayer for the Dragon of the Twelve Reflections**:
**The Primordial Seal Decree descends to the Abyss**,
**The Dark Pass and Nightly Assembly**,
**Guilt and suffering, wrongs and grievances**,
**The Fish-Dragon proclaims the message**,
**Souls and spirits undergo refinement**,
**Escaping the Dark Pass**,
**The Spirit Lord transforms and ascends**,
**To the Three Heavens, as the Decree commands**,
**The Dragon of the Twelve Reflections transmits**.

**The Twelve Reflections**:
1. **Reflect on Heaven and Earth in harmonious union**,
2. **Reflect on the Great Dao’s flourishing**,
3. **Reflect on yin and yang in proper sequence**,
4. **Reflect on the Sun and Moon’s radiant clarity**,
5. **Reflect on temples and ancestral halls in stability**,
6. **Reflect on the Sacred Calculations extending longevity**,
7. **Reflect on the myriad people thriving in peace**,
8. **Reflect on the hundred grains in abundance**,
9. **Reflect on the extraordinary appearing among the masses**,
10. **Reflect on disasters and calamities not arising**,
11. **Reflect on auspicious blessings bestowed**,
12. **Reflect on governance and merit accomplished**.

**The Twelve Vows**:
1. **Vow for Heaven’s prosperity and Earth’s obedience**,
2. **Vow for the Dao’s reverence and virtue’s exaltation**,
3. **Vow for the Five Phases’ rectitude**,
4. **Vow for the Nine Temples’ veneration**,
5. **Vow for all people to rejoice in blessings**,
6. **Vow for the Four Seas’ unity**,
7. **Vow for all things to flourish and prosper**,
8. **Vow for the hundred grains’ luxuriant growth**,
9. **Vow for the ruler’s harmonious governance and ministers’ accord**,
10. **Vow for the populace’s contentment and the times’ splendor**,
11. **Vow for alignment with the Dao’s perfect resonance**,
12. **Vow for eternal ages without bound**.

**Again**:
1. **Vow for Heaven and Earth’s purity revealed**,
2. **Vow for *qi* and phenomena’s clarity and mystery**,
3. **Vow for the Sage’s ten thousand years of life**,
4. **Vow for transformation harmonizing the Eight Extremes**,
5. **Vow for Heaven’s sweet dew descending**,
6. **Vow for Earth’s auspicious mists arising**,
7. **Vow for the Four Seasons’ timely response**,
8. **Vow for the hundred things’ full vitality**,
9. **Vow for households overflowing with filial piety and fraternal virtue**,
10. **Vow for the nation’s wealth in talent and virtue**,
11. **Vow for the Nine Dark Realms’ cessation of trials**,
12. **Vow for those who study the Dao to become Immortals**.

**The Ancient Ritual’s Twelve Vows and Reflections**,
**Comprehensively encompassing all**,
**Only then does one witness the breadth of vow-power**,
**With these vows and reflections**,
**Returning merit to the family, nation, and Dark/Luminous realms**.

**The Meaning of the Ancient Ritual’s Scriptures**,
**Is likewise complete and perfect**,
**As seen in its thoroughness**.
**If following Master Cao’s Ritual of the Twelve Reflections**,
**It is otherwise**.
**For the nation, it focuses solely on national affairs**,
**For the departed, it focuses solely on their ascent and elevation**,
**For disaster elimination, it focuses solely on prayer and exorcism**.
**The rituals they adhere to**,
**Are likewise thus in purpose**.
**Now, I record them all**,
**So that practitioners may choose for themselves**.

**Cao’s Ritual of the Twelve Reflections for the Nation**:
1. **Reflect on Heaven free from malevolent *qi***,
2. **Reflect on Earth free from demonic dust**,
3. **Reflect on the Spirit Wind’s stillness**,
4. **Reflect on the Sun and Moon’s bright illumination**,
5. **Reflect on the Eight Auspices merging with the Dark**,
6. **Reflect on the Ten Directions purified in solemnity**,
7. **Reflect on all receiving liberation and enlightenment**,
8. **Reflect on the people calling it the Great Peace**,
9. **Reflect on the myriad spirits guarding and protecting**,
10. **Reflect on the myriad heavens recording their names**,
11. **Reflect on merits and virtues being most profound**,
12. **Reflect on all attaining eternal life**.

**Again, for Ascent and Elevation**:
1. **Vow for no untimely death or calamity**,
2. **Vow for blessings extending to the leaking springs**,
3. **Vow for grievances and wrongs resolved in harmony**,
4. **Vow for suffering to cease and elevation to arise**,
5. **Vow for disputes and lawsuits to end**,
6. **Vow for the dead to be restored and no longer entangled**,
7. **Vow for the Nine Dragons to speed the command**,
8. **Vow for the souls’ gates to refine them into Immortals**,
9. **Vow for the Dark Prisons’ cessation of trials**,
10. **Vow for the Seven Ancestors to ascend to Heaven**,
11. **Vow for the Red Mound to receive the Degree**,
12. **Vow for attaining Naturalness through seated meditation**.

**Again, for Disaster Elimination**:
1. **Vow for all households to be healthy and secure**,
2. **Vow for parents’ longevity**,
3. **Vow for all malevolent forces to return to rectitude**,
4. **Vow for all evil not to sprout**,
5. **Vow for the Five Paths to be unobstructed**,
6. **Vow for dwellings to be peaceful and stable**,
7. **Vow for enterprises to flourish and prosper**,
8. **Vow for the Six Livestock to thrive**,
9. **Vow for illnesses to be cured**,
10. **Vow for wealth and possessions to overflow**,
11. **Vow for no sudden misfortunes to arise**,
12. **Vow for perpetual auspiciousness and purity**.

**Universal Offering and Praise**:
**Each person holds their reflection**,
**Focusing their thoughts on the Heavenly Venerable**,
**Bowing their heads in homage and taking refuge**,
**Burning incense and offering with devotion**.
**May the incense smoke rise thick and pervasive**,
**Filling the Ten Directions’ realm**,
**Ascending to the Supreme Great Luo Heaven**,
**The Celestial Capital of Jade**,
**The Verdant Terrace of Crimson Obscurity**,
**The Seven Treasures of the Purple Micro-Cosmos Palace**,
**The Primordial Heavenly Venerable**,
**The Void Sovereign of Highest**,
**The Ten Directions’ myriad Saints**,
**The Three Realms’ True Immortals**,
**The Treasure Vaults of Sacred Scriptures**,
**The Master of the Mystic Center**,
**With reverent hearts and returned merit**,
**All entering the same Dharma Gate**.
**May this incense smoke, offered with sincerity and universality**,
**Take refuge in the True Triple Gem of the Heavenly Decree**.

**Prayer Scripture for the Eightfold Might’s True Scripture to Calm the Tomb and Secure the Dwelling**:
**The Three Lights shine clear**,
**The Heavenly Order revolves in return**,
**The Degree transmitted to its destined end**,
**The Hundred and Six follow the sacred law**,
**The [□□] aligns with the Dipper’s Pole**.

Seven Stars** **total the celestial pole**,
**Receiving the seal from the Northern Primordial**.

**Northern Black Emperor’s Disaster-Eliminating Decree**:
**The North Star aids the Kidney**,
**The Dipper and Bull** **guard the gate**,
**The Female Void and Peril** **oversee the chamber**,
**The Fourfold Abyss opens wide**,
**The Wall’s Seven Stars** **summon the malevolent**,

chunks.original_text: 此咒固非赞咏篇所编，然患多出於耳闻口授，讹缪者多，故着于此，俾自童子时点授，则终身售用也。 又按此咒，皆制邪之文，故皆有我字，或有改为臣字，误也。 诵咒发炉存神之后，方是关奏上真，初无嫌尔，并依金箓仪及藏经诸处契勘录出。 东方 九气青天，明星大神，焕照东乡，洞映九门，转烛阳光，扫秽除氛。 开明童子，备卫我轩，收魔束妖，上对帝君，奉承正道。 赤书玉文，九天符命，摄龙驿传，普天安镇，我得飞仙。 众和，末句以下同。 南方 南方丹天，三气流光，荧星转烛，洞照太阳。 上有赤精，开明灵童，总御火兵，备守三宫，斩邪束妖，剪截魔王，北帝所承。 此咒皆以制魔伏鬼，不令干犯道场。 凡行道之人，尔凡伏群魔，皆属北帝。 北云北帝所承，或有以为南方咒，改为赤帝诵之，误也。 此为害义，不得不明之。 风火八冲，流铃交焕，敢有不从，正道流行，我享上功，保天长存，亿劫无终。 翦截魔王字藏中科仪，一曰魔 凶，则韵方叶尔。 西方
chunks.translated_text:
「This spell is not originally compiled in the *Praise and Chant* section, yet many afflictions arise from hearsay and oral transmission, with numerous errors and distortions. Hence, it is recorded here, so that from childhood one may be instructed in it, and thus apply it throughout one’s life.

Moreover, examining this spell, all its verses are texts to subdue evil (*制邪*), so each contains the character *wǒ* (我, "I/we"). Some mistakenly alter it to *chén* (臣, "subject"), which is incorrect.

After reciting the spell, igniting the furnace, and focusing one’s mind (*存神*), then comes the moment of invoking the *Upper True* (上真) and sealing the decree. There is no taboo in this sequence; it follows the *Golden Talisman Rites* (*金箓仪*) and cross-references the *Dao藏* (*Dao Canon*) for verification.

**East:**
Nine *Qi* of Azure Heaven, the Great Spirit of Bright Stars,
Illuminating the Eastern Region, piercingly revealing the Nine Gates,
Turning radiant the Yang Light, sweeping away filth and dissipating the *fēn* (氛, malevolent influences).
The *Kāimíng* (开明, "Illuminating") Child, guarding my hall (*我轩*),
Binding demons and subduing *yāo* (妖, spirits),
Standing before the Imperial Lord, offering the True *Dao*.
The *Chìshū* (赤书, "Red Scripture") and *Yùzì* (玉字, "Jade Characters"),
the Nine Heavens’ True Commandments, summoning the *Lóngyì* (龙驿, "Dragon Post") to transmit,
universal peace and stability throughout the heavens—*I* attain flying immortality (*飞仙*).
All in harmony; the remaining verses follow the same pattern.

**South:**
The Southern Region of Vermilion Heaven, where the Three *Qi* flow with radiance,
the Glowing Stars revolve like torches, piercingly illuminating the Great Sun.
Above, the *Chìjīng* (赤精, "Vermilion Refined") and *Kāimíng* (开明) Spirit Child,
commanding the Fire Soldiers, guarding the Three Palaces,
beheading evil and binding *yāo*, severing the *Mówáng* (魔王, "Demon King"),
as decreed by the Northern Emperor.
This spell is entirely for subduing demons and spirits, preventing them from disturbing the *Dao*’s sacred grounds (*道场*).

All who practice the *Dao* must subdue the multitude of demons—all belong to the Northern Emperor.
The Northern Clouds are under the Northern Emperor’s jurisdiction; some mistakenly claim this is a Southern spell, altering it to be recited by the *Chìdì* (赤帝, "Vermilion Lord"), which is incorrect.
This confusion is harmful and must be clarified.
The Eight *Chōng* (冲, "Assaults") of Wind and Fire,
jingling bells in alternating brilliance—dare any resist?
The True *Dao* spreads, *I* reap the rewards, safeguarding Heaven’s eternal preservation,
for countless *jiè* (劫, eons), without end.
The phrase "Severing the Demon King" is derived from the *Dao藏*’s ritual procedures (*科仪*), where "魔" (*Mó*, "Demon") is pronounced *xiān* (凶, "calamitous").

**West:**」

chunks.original_text: 七气素天，太白流精，光耀金门，洞照太冥。 中有素皇，号曰帝灵，保神安镇，卫我身形，断绝邪源，王道正明，宫殿整肃，三景齐并，道合自然，飞升紫庭。 灵宝符命，普惠万生，功加一切，天地咸宁。 北方 北方玄天，五气徘徊，辰星焕烂，光耀太微。 黑灵尊神，飞玄羽衣，谓黑灵尊神衣，飞玄之羽服，或有避为飞仙羽衣，则害义。 备守五门，检精捕非，敢有干试，豁落斩摧。 玉符所告，神振八威，邪门闭塞，正道明开，映照我身，三光同辉，谓身与三光同辉，或改为三官洞辉，误也。 策空驾浮，举形仙飞。 中央 黄中总气，总统仙真，镇星吐辉，流焕九天。 开光童子，一十二人，元气炎精，焰上朱烟，仪中并是焰上，或曰炎上，误也。 洞照坛所，及得我身。 百邪摧落， 却鬼万千，中山神咒，普天使然，五灵安镇，身飞上仙。 五炼生尸宝章 东方龙汉始青九阳梵华之气宝章 九阳回妙气，三景散元精。 碧霭浮灵篆，青林粲淑英。 超遥玉清府，辽邈蓬莱瀛。 真化通无间，神风滋万生。 南方赤明丹光三阳梵灵之黑宝章 浩劫开神运，龙文泛赤霞。 八威奔电激，九凤破凶邪。 炼度丹皇室，飞升元始家。 炎明常继照，灵庆袭晨华。 西方延康素灵七阳梵英之气宝章 皇老储灵粹，金精耀斗威。 六天咸馘灭，万宝复幽微。 爽气浮高阙，寒光霭素辉。 空洞披玉勒，空洞之文，勒字玉简，故云玉勒披开也。 华丽九霄飞。 北方开皇玄上五阳梵混之气宝章 五气符元妙，诸天混太冥。 神旌飞羽黑，神旌以黑羽为饰飞扬也。 玉女散花青。 紫策封天宝，玄文凛帝庭。 玄天之文严，重秘于帝耳。
chunks.translated_text:
The Seven *Qi* (气) of pristine Heaven,
the *Taìbái* (太白, "Great White") pours forth its essence,
illuminating the Golden Gate, piercingly enlightening the Great Darkness.

Within lies the *Sùhuáng* (素皇, "Pristine Sovereign"), named *Dìlíng* (帝灵, "Imperial Spirit"),
preserving and calming the divine, guarding my form,
severing the source of evil—*Wángdào* (王道, "Sovereign Dao/Way") stands clear,
palaces in solemn order, the Three *Jǐng* (景, "Luminaries") aligned,
the Dao/Way harmonizes naturally, ascending to the Purple Court.

The *Língbǎo* (灵宝, "Numinous Treasure") talisman’s efficacy,
universally benefits all beings,
its merit encompassing all—Heaven and Earth alike are pacified.

**North:** The North’s Mysterious Heaven,
where the Five *Qi* (气) linger in motion,
the *Chénxīng* (辰星, "Star of Destiny") blazes resplendent,
illuminating the *Tàiwēi* (太微, "Great Subtlety").

The *Hēilíng* (黑灵, "Dark Spirit") Venerable Deity,
clad in *Fēixuān* (飞玄, "Ascending Mysterious") robes—
some mistakenly alter this to *Fēixiān* (飞仙, "Ascending Immortal") robes, which is incorrect.
This confusion is harmful and must be avoided.

Defending the Five Gates,
refining essence and capturing transgression—
dare any attempt intrusion?
They shall be shattered and annihilated.

The *Yùfú* (玉符, "Jade Talisman") decrees,
the Deity’s might resounds with the Eight *Wēi* (威, "Awe"),
evil gates sealed shut, the True Dao/Way brightly revealed,
its radiance reflected upon my person—
the Three *Guāng* (光, "Luminaries") shine together.
Some mistakenly alter this to *Sānguān* (三官, "Three Officials") piercingly enlightened, which is incorrect.

Riding the void and mastering the floating,
lifting my form to ascend as an immortal.

**Central:** The Yellow Center gathers all *Qi*,
overseeing the governance of immortal truth,
the *Zhènxīng* (镇星, "Guarding Star") emits its radiance,
illuminating the Nine Heavens.

The *Kāiguāng* (开光, "Awakening Light") *Tóngzǐ* (童子, "Boy/Child"),
twelve in number—
their *yuángqi* (元气, "Original Qi") flares with *fánhuá* (梵华, "Buddha-Light") essence,
and the flame ascends as *zhūyān* (朱烟, "Crimson Mist").
Some mistakenly alter this to *yānshàng* (焰上, "Flame Ascends") or *yánshàng* (炎上, "Heat Ascends"), which is incorrect.

Piercingly enlightening the altar and my form,
vanquishing myriad demons,
repelling ten thousand ghosts—
the *Shāngshān* (中山, "Central Peak") Deity’s spell,
universally compels all under Heaven,
the Five *Líng* (灵, "Spirits") are calmed,
and my form ascends to the immortals.

The Five *Liàn* (炼, "Refinements") Generating Corpse Treasure Talisman:

**East:** The Dragon Han (龙汉) initiates the *Jiǔyáng* (九阳, "Nine Yang") *Fánhuá* (梵华, "Buddha-Light") *Qi* Essence Treasure Talisman.
The Nine Yang returns with marvelous *Qi*,
the Three *Jǐng* (景) disperse the Original Essence.

The *Bì’ǎi* (碧霭, "Azure Mist") floats with numinous inscriptions,
the *Qīnglín* (青林, "Green Forest") displays refined *Shùyīng* (淑英, "Pure Brilliance").
Ascending to the *Yùqīngfǔ* (玉清府, "Jade Purity Palace"),
boundless as *Péngláiyíng* (蓬莱瀛, "Penglai Isles").

The True Transformation penetrates the *Wújiàn* (无间, "Immeasurable"),
the *Shénfēng* (神风, "Divine Wind") nourishes all beings.

**South:** The *Chìmíng* (赤明, "Vermilion Clarity") *Dānguāng* (丹光, "Cinnabar Light") Three Yang *Fánlíng* (梵灵, "Buddha-Spirit") *Hēi* (黑, "Black") Treasure Talisman.
Across boundless *jiè* (劫, eons), the Deity’s movement unfolds,
the Dragon’s script radiates with *Chìxiá* (赤霞, "Vermilion Mist").

The Eight *Wēi* (威) charge like lightning, the Nine *Fèng* (凤, "Phoenix") shatter calamitous evil.
Refining and liberating the *Dānhuáng* (丹皇, "Cinnabar Sovereign") Palace,
ascending to the *Yuánshǐ* (元始, "Primordial Origin") clan.

The *Yánmíng* (炎明, "Flame Clarity") endures in perpetual radiance,
the *Língqìng* (灵庆, "Spiritual Celebration") follows the morning’s brilliance.

**West:** The *Yánkāng* (延康, "Prolonging Health") *Sùlíng* (素灵, "Pristine Spirit") Seven Yang *Fánshùyīng* (梵淑英, "Buddha-Pure Brilliance") *Qi* Treasure Talisman.
The *Huánglǎo* (皇老, "Sovereign Elder") stores the refined essence,
the *Jīnxīng* (金精, "Golden Essence") radiates with *Dòuwēi* (斗威, "Combat Awe").

The Six Heavens are all cleansed and extinguished,
ten thousand treasures return to their hidden depths.
The *Shuǎngqi* (爽气, "Purifying Qi") floats at the High Gate,
the *Hán’ǎi* (寒光, "Cold Light") veils the pristine radiance.

The void is pierced, the *Yùlè* (玉勒, "Jade Inscription") unfurls—
the *Lè* (勒) refers to the *Yùjiàn* (玉简, "Jade Slips"), hence "Jade Inscription unfurls."
The glory ascends to the Nine Exalted Heavens.

**North:** The *Kāihuáng* (开皇, "Opening Sovereignty") *Xuānshàng* (玄上, "Mysterious Ascension") Five Yang *Fánhùn* (梵混, "Buddha-Blending") *Qi* Treasure Talisman.
The Five *Qi* (气) correspond to the Original Marvel,
the Heavens blend with the Great Darkness.

The *Shénjīng* (神旌, "Divine Standard") flies with black plumes—
the *Shénjīng* is adorned with black plumes and soars.
The *Yùnǚ* (玉女, "Jade Maiden") scatters green flowers.

The *Zǐcè* (紫策, "Purple Tablet") seals the Heavenly Treasure,
the *Xuānwén* (玄文, "Mysterious Script") stands solemn in the Imperial Court.
The *Xuāntiān* (玄天, "Mysterious Heaven")’s script is stern,
its secrets deeply concealed in the Emperor’s ear.
